Detailed Description

Dbus universal listener api.

Define Documentation

#define MAX_DBUS_LISTENERS   2

how much components should listen simultaneously

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct dbus_listener_def * dbus_listener

structure holding info about listening component

typedef message_handle_state_e(*) dbus_message_handler_t(DBusConnection *conn, DBusError *err_struct, DBusMessage *msg)

Try to handle dbus message. Component should check if know message and try to handle it if component doesn't know message it should return ZFSD_MESSAGE_UNKNONW

Parameters:
conn valid dbus connection with syplog names registered
err_struct initialized dbus error struct
msg message received
Returns:
ZFSD_MESSAGE_HANDLED if handled, ZFSD_HANDLE_ERROR if message is known bud error occured in processing, ZFSD_MESSAGE_UKNONWN if zfsd doesn't known message type

typedef int(*) dbus_name_add_t(DBusConnection *connection, DBusError *err_struct)

Register names to dbus connection Component should add dbus names in which wants to listen and signal match rules.

Parameters:
connection initialized dbus connection
err_struct initialized dbus error struct
Returns:
TRUE if successfully added, FALSE otherwise

typedef int(*) dbus_name_release_t(DBusConnection *connection, DBusError *err_struct)

Release names from dbus connection. Component should release all dbus names and signal match rules which is adding in dbus_name_add_t.

Parameters:
connection initialized dbus connection
err_struct initialized dbus error struct
Returns:
TRUE if successfully released, FALSE otherwise

typedef struct dbus_state_holder_def * dbus_state_holder

structure holding dbus_provider state (loop and components info)

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum message_handle_state_e

Enum of message handling result.

Enumerator:
ZFSD_MESSAGE_HANDLED  message was successfully handled
ZFSD_MESSAGE_UNKNOWN  message type is not known
ZFSD_NO_MESSAGE  no message provided
ZFSD_HANDLE_ERROR  error occured during handling

Function Documentation

int dbus_provider_add_listener ( dbus_state_holder  settings_struct,
dbus_name_add_t  add_name,
dbus_name_release_t  release_name,
dbus_message_handler_t  handle_message 
)

Add listener (component wanting to listen for messages) to provider The provider loop should not run upon this call

Parameters:
settins_struct initialized struct of provider which doesn't run
add_name function to call to add component names to connection
release_name function to call to remove component names to connection
handle_message function to call on received message (try) to handle it
Returns:
TRUE if added, FALSE otherwise
See also:
dbus_name_add_t

dbus_name_release_t

dbus_message_handler_t

int dbus_provider_end ( dbus_state_holder  settings_struct  ) 

Stop listening thread and close dbus connection

Parameters:
settings_struct valid pointer to running provider struct
Returns:
TRUE if terminated, FALSE otherwise

int dbus_provider_init ( dbus_state_holder  settings_struct  ) 

Initialize dbus provider struct

Parameters:
settings_struct valid pointer to uninitialized settings struct
Returns:
TRUE if sucessfully initialized (FALSE otherwise)

int dbus_provider_start ( dbus_state_holder  settings_struct,
DBusBusType  bus_type 
)

Open dbus connection and dispatch listening thread

Parameters:
settins_struct initialized provider struct with added listeners (not running)
bus_type on which bus to listen (system, session or what)
TRUE if thread started, FALSE otherwise
